column4: Hello I have Ubuntu 10.04 loaded on a removable disk, but it wont let me download xchat, I tried sudo apt-get install xchat and it won't work, can ya help?
Can anyone help?
onetinsolider: Can you help me please if you can?
onetinsolider:Hello I have Ubuntu 10.04 loaded on a removable disk, but it wont let me download xchat, I tried sudo apt-get install xchat and it won't work, can ya help?
any error messages when you try that apt-get command?
It says that it is not in the E file directory.
Another thing is I don't know how to change my username on ubuntu 10.04 and when I use the sudo command it does not ask me for a password for sudo.
Did you figure out why it won't download?
those are some odd error messages.. can you pastebin them?

well.. I don't recognize any of those errors and as far as I know a regular ubuntu install does ask for your password when you use sudo.. (unless you've used sudo in the last 5 minutes or so in the same terminal)
Well I have Ubuntu 10.4 on a CD maybe that is the problem?
ubuntu 10.04 is a regular ubuntu install... so it shouldn't be the problem
When it booted it went straight to the desktop, it never asked me to create a profile.
if it's the regular desktop install cd you should first get a menu where you can choose to install, try it, check the memory and so on
I'm not sure what kind of profiles you are talking about
I am talking about the root profile.
ehm.. the root user?
I will try again and if I have problems I will come back.
do that
Because on install i was not asked to create a profile.
ok brb.
So I guess when I hit try, its like a trial.
